Constructor Detail

PiecewiseConstantPopulation

public PiecewiseConstantPopulation(Units.Type units)
Construct demographic model with default settings

Parameters:
units - of time

PiecewiseConstantPopulation

public PiecewiseConstantPopulation(double[] intervals,
                                   double[] thetas,
                                   Units.Type units)
Creates a piecewise constant model with the given break points.

Parameters:
intervals - an array of intervals, Each interval represents time over which a different population size is assumed, the first interval starts from the present and proceeds back into the past.
thetas - the population sizes of each interval. The last population size represents the time from the end of the last interval out to infinity.
